title: Elon Musk Walks His 'Spooky' Tesla Humanoid Robot Around That 'Will Be Able To Do Everything Better Than Us' — As Microsoft And BMW Partner On A Rival Robot
first_paragraph: In a past message on X, Elon Musk said Tesla Inc.'s humanoid robot called Optimus could “eliminate dangerous, repetitive, boring tasks.” He suggests a future where robots integrate into daily lives, helping people with both mundane chores like doing the dishes to working in hazardous conditions. In a Jan. 15, 2023, message on X, Musk showed an enhanced Optimus robot neatly folding a shirt after taking it out of a small basket.
